message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $1000000. I'm confident that you'll love it, and I'm willing to offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, I'll give you a full refund and replace it with a new product. But I'm sure you'll love this one. It's a rare opportunity to get a high-quality product at a discounted price. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by your guarantee. I'd like to wait for the next round and see what other options I have.

I appreciate the discount, but I'm still hesitant. I'd like to wait for the next round and see if I can get a better deal or a higher-quality product.
